Class ImageBadgeView

    public class ImageBadgeView
extends CircleImageView
    Image View with a badge like notification count

        state of a badge fixed radius by width

      • setFixedRadius

        public ImageBadgeView setFixedRadius(boolean fixedRadius)
        Define whether a badge can be with fixed radius by width. Badge can have only circle or square form.
        Parameters:
        fixedRadius - If param is true, a badge radius fixed

        state of a badge

      • setBadgeOvalAfterFirst

        public ImageBadgeView setBadgeOvalAfterFirst(boolean badgeOvalAfterFirst)
        Define whether a badge can be oval form after first value number of counter Please use this method only for custom drawable badge background. See setBadgeBackground(Drawable).
        Parameters:
        badgeOvalAfterFirst - If param is true, a badge can be oval form after first value

        Returns:
        state of a badge has limit

      • setLimitBadgeValue

        public ImageBadgeView setLimitBadgeValue(boolean badgeValueLimit)
        Define whether a badge counter can have limit
        Parameters:
        badgeValueLimit - If param is true, after max value (default 99) a badge will have counter 99+ Otherwise a badge will show the current value, e.g 101

        Set the style of the badge text. Matches the Typeface text style
        Parameters:
        badgeTextStyle - Can be normal, bold, italic, bold_italic

      • getBadgeBackground

        public int getBadgeBackground()
        Get the background of a badge.

      • setBadgeBackground

        public ImageBadgeView setBadgeBackground(android.graphics.drawable.Drawable badgeBackground)
        Set the custom background of a badge
        Parameters:
        badgeBackground - the Drawable background of a badge from resources

      • getBadgeBackgroundDrawable

        public android.graphics.drawable.Drawable getBadgeBackgroundDrawable()
        Get the background of a badge Drawable or null.

      • clearBadge

        public void clearBadge()
        Clear counter badge value

      • getBadgePosition

        public int getBadgePosition()
        Get position of a badge BadgePosition.
        Returns:
        BadgePosition position on ImageView by index
